sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHWARTZEMBERG, a town of Germany, in the circle of Franconia, and capital of a principality of the ſame name. The caſtle is ſeated on the river Lee, 5 miles north-weſt of Nuremberg, and 20 eaſt of Wertzburg, ſubject to its own prince. E. Long. 10. 27. N. Lat. 49. 43.
